data.title: Predicting The Future Of Amazon Go Stores
data.text: Amazon plans to expand its Amazon Go stores by opening cashierless supermarkets.

data.title: Exclusive: Amazon's cloud unit readies more powerful data center chip - sources
data.text: Amazon.com Inc's cloud computing unit has designed a second, more powerful generation of data center processor chip, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters, the latest sign that the company is pouring money into custom silicon for its fastest-growing business.

data.title: Amazon's Short-Term Challenges Are A Gift Investors Can Unwrap Now
data.text: Amazon's Short-Term Challenges Are A Gift Investors Can Unwrap Now

data.title: Report: Silicon Valley spends much less on lobbying than you’d think
data.text: Tech companies are not breaking their banks in attempts to bend laws in their favor.

data.title: Amazon's delivery operations is lax on safety as packages pile up
data.text: Amazon built a massive logistics operation to deliver more of its own packages – and then pushed it beyond its limits.

data.title: 10 Stocks Owned by the World’s Richest and Most Powerful
data.text: Billionaire-owned companies perform twice as well as others. Turns out the world's wealthiest and most powerful make for good investors.

data.title: Amazon Stock's Correction May Be Coming to an End
data.text: Amazon stock has rallied more than 4% since last week, posting a potential triple bottom reversal.

data.title: U.S. to announce findings from probe of France's tech tax on Monday
data.text: U.S. trade officials said they will announce any proposed action toward France on Monday when they release the findings from their investigation into the European ally’s tax on big internet companies such as Amazon, Google and Facebook.

data.title: Next five years will be 'spend spend spend' for streaming services, analyst says
data.text: Ed Barton, chief analyst for consumer and entertainment at Ovum, discusses the intensifying streaming war.

data.title: AWS expands DeepRacer league, announces car updates
data.text: Last year at AWS re:invent, the company’s massive customer conference, Amazon launched a new miniature race car and a racing league, all designed to teach developers about machine learning in a fun way. Today, ahead of next week’s re:Invent conference, the company announced some enhancements including an improved car and expanded racing schedule.

data.title: Wednesday’s Vital Data: Best Buy, Home Depot and Amazon
data.text: Options trading was buzzing in Best Buy, Home Depot and Amazon stock on Tuesday. Here are the metrics that matter moving forward.

data.title: Retailers must invest in faster shipping due to customer demand, analyst says
data.text: Monisha De La Rocha, partner at Bain & Company, and Charles O'Shea, vice president and senior credit officer at Moody's, join "Squawk Box" to discuss the retail winners heading into the holiday season.

data.title: Amazon’s International Segment Expected To Grow The Slowest Over Coming Years
data.text: Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN) makes money through its consumer ventures (online and offline retail sales, search advertising, content streaming etc) and cloud services (rental of compute, storage etc) and competes with industry leaders in the retail as well as technology industry.
